API Routes Overview

Authentication Service (port 3000)

MethodEndpointDescriptionAction
GET /api/auth/login/google Start OAuth2 login with Google Open
GET /api/auth/google/callback Google OAuth callback N/A
POST /api/auth/login Email/password login N/A

Game Service (port 3001)

MethodEndpointDescriptionAction
POST /api/game Start new solo game
GET /api/game/<gameId>/state Get current game state N/A
POST /api/game/<gameId>/input Send player action (move_up, move_down, stop) N/A
GET /metrics JSON metrics Open
